response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be a valuable asset for you as well. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a reasonable cost compared to market rates. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 200}
